statements: SELECT * FROM CashFlowStatements ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT statement_id, report_date, cash_inflow FROM CashFlowStatements WHERE cash_inflow > 10000
SELECT * FROM CashFlowStatements WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT statement_id, cash_inflow AS income, cash_outflow AS expense FROM CashFlowStatements WHERE cash_inflow > cash_outflow
SELECT statement_id, cash_inflow + cash_outflow AS net_cash_flow FROM CashFlowStatements
SELECT * FROM CashFlowStatements WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT statement_id, report_date, cash_inflow FROM CashFlowStatements WHERE cash_inflow > 1000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(cash_inflow), MAX(cash_outflow) FROM CashFlowStatements;
SELECT statement_id, cash_inflow, cash_outflow FROM CashFlowStatements WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY statement_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CashFlowStatements ORDER BY cash_inflow DESC, cash_outflow ASC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_cash_flow;
SELECT cash_flow_id, timestamp, cash_in FROM monitoring_cash_flow WHERE cash_in > 1000;
SELECT cash_out, timestamp FROM monitoring_cash_flow WHERE cash_out < 0;
SELECT cash_in, cash_out FROM monitoring_cash_flow ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_forecasting WHERE revenue > expenses;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_cash_flow ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT cash_in, cash_out FROM monitoring_cash_flow WHERE cash_in > cash_out;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_cash_flow WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT * FROM financial_forecasting ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT forecast_id, revenue FROM financial_forecasting WHERE revenue > expenses;
SELECT * FROM cash_flow_statement;
SELECT statement_id, date, income FROM cash_flow_statement WHERE income > 5000;
SELECT statement_id, date, expenses FROM cash_flow_statement ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM cash_flow_statement WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM cash_flow_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM cash_flow_statement WHERE income > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT category_name, SUM(income) AS total_income FROM cash_flow_statement JOIN cash_flow_categories ON cash_flow_statement.statement_id = cash_flow_categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name
SELECT statement_id, date, income, expenses FROM cash_flow_statement WHERE income > expenses ORDER BY statement_id LIMIT 3
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM cash_flow_categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'E%' ORDER BY category_id
SELECT date, projected_income - projected_expenses AS net_profit FROM cash_flow_forecast WHERE projected_income > projected_expenses ORDER BY net_profit DESC, date ASC
SELECT * FROM cash_flow_statement;
SELECT statement_id, amount FROM cash_flow_statement WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT category_name FROM cash_flow_category WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT statement_id, amount, date FROM cash_flow_statement ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cash_flow_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM cash_flow_statement ORDER BY date DESC, amount ASC, statement_id DESC;

SELECT category_name, SUM(forecast_amount) AS total_forecast_amount FROM cash_flow_forecast JOIN cash_flow_category ON cash_flow_forecast.category_id = cash_flow_category.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_forecast_amount DESC;

SELECT classification_name, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM cash_flow_statement JOIN cash_flow_classification ON cash_flow_statement.statement_id = cash_flow_classification.classification_id GROUP BY classification_name HAVING AVG(amount) > 1000 ORDER BY average_amount DESC;

SELECT statement_id, category_name, forecast_amount FROM cash_flow_forecast JOIN cash_flow_category ON cash_flow_forecast.category_id = cash_flow_category.category_id WHERE forecast_amount > 5000 ORDER BY statement_id ASC, forecast_amount DESC;

SELECT * FROM cash_flow_forecast INNER JOIN cash_flow_category ON cash_flow_forecast.category_id = cash_flow_category.category_id LEFT JOIN cash_flow_statement ON cash_flow_forecast.statement_id = cash_flow_statement.statement_id WHERE cash_flow_statement.statement_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM cash_flow_statements
SELECT statement_id, date, cash_in, cash_out FROM cash_flow_statements ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT category, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM income WHERE source = 'Salary'
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, predicted_cash, actual_cash FROM forecasts ORDER BY forecast_date
SELECT * FROM cash_flow_statements WHERE cash_in > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT statement_id, date, cash_out FROM cash_flow_statements WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY category HAVING total_expenses > 5000;
SELECT source, amount FROM income WHERE source LIKE '%salary%' ORDER BY income_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM forecasts WHERE actual_cash IS NULL ORDER BY forecast_date;
